meanings.sent1: The pond was actionless, with no ripples on its surface.
meanings.sent2: The movie was so actionless that I fell asleep halfway through.
meanings.sent3: The actionless cat just lounged in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: The actionless forest seemed frozen in time, untouched by the world.
meanings.sent5: The actionless room felt eerily still, as if time had stopped within its walls.

meanings.sent1: The actionless street was deserted, with no one in sight.
meanings.sent2: Her actionless career left her feeling unfulfilled and stagnant.
meanings.sent3: The actionless clock seemed to mock him as it ticked away the hours.
meanings.sent4: The actionless project was like a ship stuck in a calm sea, going nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The actionless town was a ghostly reminder of better days long past.
